# gx-query-viewer-parameter

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description            | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `Name`   | `name`    | Name of the parameter  | `string` | `undefined` |
| `Value`  | `value`   | Value of the parameter | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                   | Description                                      | Type                                            |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------- |
| `parameterValueChanged` | Fired each time the value of the control changes | `CustomEvent<QueryViewerParameterChangedEvent>` |
